auxiliaryMedia.DutyOfDisclosureContent:
What you must tell us

When answering our questions, you must be honest and you have a duty under law to tell us anything known to you, and which a reasonable person in the circumstances, would include in answer to the question. We will use the answers in deciding whether to insure you and anyone else to be insured under the policy, and on what terms.

Who needs to tell us

It is important that you understand you are answering our questions in this way for yourself and anyone else who you want to be covered by this policy.

If you do not tell us

If you do not answer our questions in this way, we may reduce or refuse to pay a claim, or cancel a policy. If you answer our questions fraudulently, we may refuse to pay a claim and treat the policy as never having worked.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
International Chat Passes

Only available to customers who are connected to a Vodafone Postpaid voice plan. Minimum monthly spend is $5, $10, $15 (for $5, $10, $15 Chat Pass respectively). Includes 240/120/30, 60, 1000 minutes of standard international voice calls (for $5, $10, $15 Chat Pass respectively) to the included Chat Pass Countries (excludes premium, video, special and overseas free phone numbers. Once your call allowance is used up, further standard international voice calls will be either deducted from your plan’s international calling allowance to Selected Countries or Global Minute Eligible Countries (if applicable for your plan), or will be charged at the PAYG rates (or at Discounted PAYG Rates if the customers has a current $10 International Value Pack) on top of your minimum monthly spend – these rates are subject to change, see www.vodafone.com.au/idd for current rates. All calls charged in per minute increments. Any unused allowance will expire at the end of billing month in which you purchased the Chat Pass. Chat Pass minute allowance is only accessible to the connection which added the Pass – they are not shareable. If your eligible voice plan is cancelled, Chat Pass will also automatically cancel. Included call value of the Chat Pass will be used first before any applicable included call value/minute entitlement of any other IDD Pack or Add-On Product you may also have on your account.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
$5 300MB Data Booster

Approved selected Postpaid Mobile Plan and Mobile Broadband Plan customers only. Included data in a Booster expires at the end of the current Postpaid Mobile Plan or Mobile Broadband Plan billing month. The one-off fee is $5. Additional data usage is charged at the additional data usage rates for the Data Add-on (if you have a Postpaid Mobile Data Add-on) or at the additional data usage rates for the Postpaid Mobile Plan (if no Data Add-on) or Mobile Broadband Plan. Included data for use in Australia on Vodafone’s network.

All Vodafone services are subject to device capabilities & network limitations & availability. A compatible 3G device is required to access 3G services. Vodafone offers U2100Mhz, U850MHz and U900Mhz devices. Broadband speeds are available in Vodafone’s 3G 2100MHz Coverage area for all compatible U2100Mhz modems (i.e. all Vodafone modems). Additionally, if you have a U850MHz compatible modem, broadband speeds are available in Vodafone's 3G 850MHz Coverage Area, if you have a U900MHz compatible modem, in Vodafone’s 3G 900MHz Coverage area (with slower speeds in the 3G 900MHz Coverage area than the other areas). If you have a modem which is U2100MHz (or U2100/850MHz) but not U900MHz compatible, then you will only have coverage in Australia within Vodafone’s 3G 2100MHz Coverage area, if available for your device, Vodafone’s 3G 850MHz Coverage Area (i.e no coverage in Vodafone's 3G 900MHz Coverage area). Actual speed achieved varies depending on factors such as device capabilities, location & network congestion. See vodafone.com.au/coverage for coverage details & vodafone.com.au/devicefrequency for details of devices and their frequencies before purchasing.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.

Selected plans only. For personal, single use on mobile only (no tethering). Only use via the official App of each provider is eligible. Not shareable with other services on your account. auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
Vodafone Passes

Selected plans only. For personal, single use on mobile only (no tethering). Only use via the official App of each provider is eligible. Not shareable with other services on your account. Min monthly spend is $5 (Chat), $10 (Music & Social) or $15 (Video). For use in Oz only. Actual speeds vary due to things like device capabilities, location and network congestion. Exclusions apply & will incur standard data charges, such as: advertisements; all VOIP & Video calls via WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger; access to 3rd party Apps embedded within Pass Apps; external links & content; GIFs; streaming video catalogues; podcasts; RSS feeds; album art, lyrics & video clips. 500MB bonus data will be allocated to you to use on exclusions. Full exclusion list vodafone.com.au/support/passes. Suitable for one stream per service. All Pass Apps are subject to change – view current list & full info at vodafone.com.au/passes. Terms of individual subscription services apply.  Recurring monthly Pass fees charged until the end of the month in which you cancel. Compatible device required.  Netflix streaming membership and compatible device required to watch instantly. Netflix Terms of Use apply, www.netflix.com/termsofuse.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
International Chat Passes

Only available to customers who are connected to a Vodafone Postpaid voice plan. Minimum monthly spend is $5 and $10 (for $5 and $10 Talk Booster respectively). $5 International Talk Booster Zone 1 Includes 240 minutes of standard international voice calls to the Zone 1 Countries. $10 International Talk Booster Zone 2 Includes 60 minutes of standard international voice calls to the Zone 2 Countries. All included minutes exclude premium, video, special and overseas free phone numbers. Once your call allowance is used up, further standard international voice calls will be either deducted from your plan’s international calling allowance to Zone 1 or Zone 2 Countries (if applicable for your plan), or will be charged at the PAYG rates (or at Discounted PAYG Rates if the customers has a current $10 International Value Pack) on top of your minimum monthly spend – these rates are subject to change, see www.vodafone.com.au/idd for current rates. All calls charged in per minute increments. Any unused allowance will expire at the end of billing month in which you purchased the Talk Booster. Talk Booster minute allowance is only accessible to the connection which added the Talk Booster – they are not shareable. If your eligible voice plan is cancelled, Talk Booster will also automatically cancel. Included call value of the Talk Booster will be used first before any applicable included call value/minute entitlement of any other IDD Pack or Add-On Product you may also have on your account.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
$5 International Access Pack
Only available to customers who are connected to a Vodafone Postpaid Consumer Voice Plan released on or after 2 September 2016 or a Business Flex Plan. Minimum monthly spend is $5. There is no separate international call allowance included with this Pack – it simply gives you access to our Discounted PAYG rates for standard international voice calls from Australia (excludes premium, video, special and overseas free phone numbers). Rates vary per country and are subject to change - the full current list of Discounted PAYG rates can be found at http://vfau.co/khcdc. If your plan includes an allowance of international calls to Selected Countries, these will be used up first before the discounted rates will apply. All calls charged in per minute increments on top of your minimum monthly spend. Max one pack per connection per month. Discounted PAYG rates are only accessible to the connection who has added the Pack – it is not shareable. If your eligible voice plan is cancelled, this Pack will also automatically cancel. Recurring monthly access fee charged until the end of the month in which you cancel. If you have an existing Vodafone International Calling Add-On on your account, it may be automatically cancelled if you chose to purchase this Pack and you will not be able to purchase old Add-Ons again – you can call us on 1555 to see if this applies to you.

longDescription: Includes data to use on your mobile phone within Australia.Any additional data use will be charged as per the applicable additional data rate for your plan product – refer to your specific plan’s additional data charge rate for details.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
Data Add-on $50 for 10GB
This Data Add-on costs $50 per month and includes 10GB of data for mobile internet. Minimum monthly spend is $50.

Recurs monthly until the end of the bill cycle in which you discontinue the Data Add-on; and any included value expires at the end of the month purchased. Data is deducted in per KB increments. Once Add-on allowance exhausted, further data usage is deducted from your voice plan’s Included Data allowance (if any). If voice plan allowance exhausted, you will be charged the applicable additional data rate for your voice plan – see your voice plan for rates for details. If you’ve gone over your plan and then add a Data Add-on, it won’t absorb any extra data charges incurred before you added it. Included data for use in Australia on Vodafone's network.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.
Please read the terms and conditions here.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
International Chat Passes

Only available to customers who are connected to a Vodafone Postpaid voice plan. Minimum monthly spend is $5, $10, $15 (for $5, $10, $15 Chat Pass respectively). Includes 240/120/30, 60, 1000 minutes of standard international voice calls (for $5, $10, $15 Chat Pass respectively) to the included Chat Pass Countries (excludes premium, video, special and overseas free phone numbers. Once your call allowance is used up, further standard international voice calls will be either deducted from your plan’s international calling allowance to Selected Countries or Global Minute Eligible Countries (if applicable for your plan), or will be charged at the PAYG rates (or at Discounted PAYG Rates if the customers has a current $10 International Value Pack) on top of your minimum monthly spend – these rates are subject to change, see www.vodafone.com.au/idd for current rates. All calls charged in per minute increments. Any unused allowance will expire at the end of billing month in which you purchased the Chat Pass. Chat Pass minute allowance is only accessible to the connection which added the Pass – they are not shareable. If your eligible voice plan is cancelled, Chat Pass will also automatically cancel. Included call value of the Chat Pass will be used first before any applicable included call value/minute entitlement of any other IDD Pack or Add-On Product you may also have on your account.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.

$10 1GB Data Booster

Approved selected Postpaid Mobile Plan and Mobile Broadband Plan customers only. Included data in a Booster expires at the end of the current Postpaid Mobile Plan or Mobile Broadband Plan billing month. The one-off fee is $10. Additional data usage is charged at the additional data usage rates for the Data Add-on (if you have a Postpaid Mobile Data Add-on) or at the additional data usage rates for the Postpaid Mobile Plan (if no Data Add-on) or Mobile Broadband Plan. Included data for use in Australia on Vodafone's network.

All Vodafone services are subject to device capabilities & network limitations & availability. A compatible 3G device is required to access 3G services. Vodafone offers U2100Mhz, U850MHz and U900Mhz devices. Broadband speeds are available in Vodafone's 3G 2100MHz Coverage area for all compatible U2100Mhz modems (i.e. all Vodafone modems). Additionally, if you have a U850MHz compatible modem, broadband speeds are available in Vodafone's 3G 850MHz Coverage Area, if you have a U900MHz compatible modem, in Vodafone's 3G 900MHz Coverage area (with slower speeds in the 3G 900MHz Coverage area than the other areas). If you have a modem which is U2100MHz (or U2100/850MHz) but not U900MHz compatible, then you will only have coverage in Australia within Vodafone's 3G 2100MHz Coverage area, if available for your device, Vodafone's 3G 850MHz Coverage Area (i.e no coverage in Vodafone's 3G 900MHz Coverage area). Actual speed achieved varies depending on factors such as device capabilities, location & network congestion. See vodafone.com.au/coverage for coverage details & vodafone.com.au/devicefrequency for details of devices and their frequencies before purchasing.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
International Chat Passes

Only available to customers who are connected to a Vodafone Postpaid voice plan. Minimum monthly spend is $5 and $10 (for $5 and $10 Talk Booster respectively). $5 International Talk Booster Zone 1 Includes 240 minutes of standard international voice calls to the Zone 1 Countries. $10 International Talk Booster Zone 2 Includes 60 minutes of standard international voice calls to the Zone 2 Countries. All included minutes exclude premium, video, special and overseas free phone numbers. Once your call allowance is used up, further standard international voice calls will be either deducted from your plan’s international calling allowance to Zone 1 or Zone 2 Countries (if applicable for your plan), or will be charged at the PAYG rates (or at Discounted PAYG Rates if the customers has a current $10 International Value Pack) on top of your minimum monthly spend – these rates are subject to change, see www.vodafone.com.au/idd for current rates. All calls charged in per minute increments. Any unused allowance will expire at the end of billing month in which you purchased the Talk Booster. Talk Booster minute allowance is only accessible to the connection which added the Talk Booster – they are not shareable. If your eligible voice plan is cancelled, Talk Booster will also automatically cancel. Included call value of the Talk Booster will be used first before any applicable included call value/minute entitlement of any other IDD Pack or Add-On Product you may also have on your account.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
Terms and conditions

Data Booster 2GB $30 One-off

Approved selected Postpaid Mobile Plan and Mobile Broadband Plan customers only. Included data in a Booster expires at the end of the current Postpaid Mobile Plan or Mobile Broadband Plan billing month. The one-off fee is $30. Additional data usage is charged at the additional data usage rates for the Data Add-on (if you have a Postpaid Mobile Data Add-on) or at the additional data usage rates for the Postpaid Mobile Plan (if no Data Add-on) or Mobile Broadband Plan. Included data for use in Australia on Vodafone’s network.

All Vodafone services are subject to device capabilities & network limitations & availability. A compatible 3G device is required to access 3G services. Vodafone 3G works on three different 3G network zones: U2100MHz, U850MHz and U900MHz. You can reach Broadband Speeds within these areas when you have a handset which is compatible to that particular zone/s. Broadband Speeds not available in any 2G area. Actual speed achieved varies depending on factors such as device capabilities, location & network congestion. See www.vodafone.com.au/coverage for coverage.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
$10 International Value Pack
Only available to customers who are connected to a Vodafone Postpaid Consumer Voice Plan released on or after 2 September 2016 or a Business Flex Plan. Minimum monthly spend is $10. Includes $10 value of standard international voice calls at the current “Discounted PAYG” rates (excludes premium, video, special and overseas free phone numbers). Rates vary per country and are subject to change - the full current list of Discounted PAYG rates can be found at http://vfau.co/khcdc. Once your $10 allowance is used up, further standard international voice calls will be either deducted from your plan’s international calling allowance to Selected Countries (if applicable for your plan), or continue to be charged at the Discounted PAYG rates on top of your minimum monthly spend. All calls charged in per minute increments. Any unused allowance will expire at the end of each month. Max one pack per connection per month. Discounted PAYG rates and $10 allowance are only accessible to the connection who has added the Pack – they are not shareable. If your eligible voice plan is cancelled, this Pack will also automatically cancel. Recurring monthly access fee charged until the end of the month in which you cancel. If you have an existing Vodafone International Calling Add-On on your account, it may be automatically cancelled if you chose to purchase this Pack and you will not be able to purchase old Add-Ons again – you can call us on 1555 to see if this applies to you.
Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554

All Vodafone services are subject to device capabilities & network limitations & availability. A compatible 3G device is required to access 3G services. Vodafone 3G works on three different 3G network zones: U2100MHz, U850MHz and U900MHz. You can reach Broadband Speeds within these areas when you have a handset which is compatible to that particular zone/s. Broadband Speeds not available in any 2G area. Actual speed achieved varies depending on factors such as device capabilities, location & network congestion. See www.vodafone.com.au/coverage for coverage.

Includes data to use on your smartphone or mobile broadband device in Argentina, Brazil, Croatia, Egypt, Fiji, Israel, Mexico, Poland, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Sweden, Turkey and the United Arab Emirates.

If you use more than the included data in your Add-on, you’ll pay $4 per MB (minimum 20KB session).

If you use data in a country that is not included in this Add-on, you’ll pay the standard data roaming rate of 1c per KB (minimum 10KB session).

auxiliaryMedia.T&CContent:
Terms and conditions

Data to use in Premium destinations

Available to existing Vodafone postpaid voice or MBB customers. For use in selected countries only. Minimum monthly spend is $60 (50MB Add-on), $120 (100MB Add-on). Minimum monthly fee is recurring and continues to apply until the end of the month in which you notify Vodafone that you wish to cancel. One month expiry period applies to data and unused data will not roll over at the end of the month. Additional charges of $4 per MB with a minimum session of 20KB applies for usage exceeding the included monthly data allowance. Maximum of 1 Premium Destinations Overseas Data Add-on can be added to your Plan. International data roaming service is subject to overseas network limitations and availability and individual device capabilities. Selected countries subject to change see vodafone.com.au/roaming for current list.

Vodafone Pty Ltd ABN 76 062 954 554.
